    Class AudioBuffer

    Azurite

    Instantiations of this class hold all information about how a sound should be replayed and the sound data itself (if you know OpenGL, think of this as a massive vbo containing a single noise or piece of music).

    Personally I don't really like how it works right now; it allocates a lot of memory for every sound file that needs to be played; maybe we can have a destructor or some kind of cleanup daemon?

    I based the design off of an article by Michael Eric Oberlin found here.
